casebody.data:
SWIFT
v.
RICHARDSON SPORTS, et al. No. 598P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. R. James Lore, Raleigh, for Michael Swift. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Richardson Sports, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of April 2006 by Defendants to Dismiss Plaintiff's Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
